title: Write rollback-to.md command
description: Create command to restore files and task state to a previous checkpoint. Loads checkpoint metadata, confirms with user, restores files (only if changed via hash comparison), optionally restores task status, and reports restoration details.
notes: Created rollback-to.md command for restoring checkpoint state. Implements 7-step process: load checkpoint, analyze current state (hash comparison), confirm with user, restore files (RESTORE/REMOVE/MISSING/UNCHANGED actions), optional task status restoration, report results, preserve checkpoint. Includes safety features (confirmation required, pre-rollback checkpoint offer), selective restoration, and diff display.
